Tim Penyidik KPK Panggil Karyawan Bank BUMN Terkait Dana Hibah KONI 2018
04 Nov 2019, 09:58 by Chairul Umam


Tim Penyidik KPK Panggil Karyawan Bank BUMN Terkait Dana Hibah KONI 2018

KBRN, Jakarta : Penyidik Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) hari ini dijadwalkan memanggil Denim Martyan salah satu karyawan bank BNI yang juga sekaligus melakukan pemeriksaan terhadap sejumlah saksi terkait kasus perkara dugaan Tindak Pidana Korupsi (Tipikor) suap. Kasus suap yang dimaksud adalah pemberian bantuan dana hibah dari Kementrian Pemuda dan Olahraga kepada Komite Olahraga Nasional Indonesia (KONI).
Kasus dugaan suap itu yang diduga melibatkan mantan Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga (Menpora) Nahrawi. Penyidik KPK hari ini dijadwalkan memanggil Denim Martyan diketahui sebagai karyawan bank BUMN.
"Yang bersangkutan (Denim Martyan dipanggil dalam kapasitasnya sebagai saksi untuk tersangka IMR (Iman Nahrawi)," kata Kabiro Humas KPK Febri Diansyah di Jakarta Sumat (04/11/2019).
Penyidik KPK sebelumnya telah menetapkan Imam Nahrawi sebagai tersangka kasus dugaan suap terkait hibah KONI. Imam saat itu diduga menerima total suap Rp 26,5 miliar.
Wakil Ketua KPK Alexander Marwata sebelumnya mengatakan bahwa dalam kurun waktu 2014 hingga 2018, IMR (Menpora) melalui MIU selaku asisten pribadi Menpora diduga telah menerima uang sejumlah Rp 14,7 miliar.
KPK menduga bahwa tersangka Imam juga diduga meminta uang sebesar Rp 11,8 miliar dalam kurun 2016 hingga 2018. Total dugaan penerimaan 26,5 miliar.
Uang itu diduga merupakan “commitment fee” terkait pengurusan hibah yang diajukan pihak KONI kepada Kemenpora pada 2018. Penerimaan juga diduga terkait dengan jabatan Imam sebagai Ketua Dewan Pengarah Satlak Prima.

KPK Investigation Team Summons Employees of BUMN Banks Related to KONI 2018 Grant Funds
Nov 04 2019, 09:58 by Chairul Umam


KPK Investigation Team Summons Employees of BUMN Banks Related to KONI 2018 Grant Funds

KBRN, Jakarta: Investigators of the Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) today are scheduled to summon Denim Martyan, one of BNI's bank employees who also conducts an examination of a number of witnesses related to cases of alleged bribery (Corruption). The bribery case in question is the provision of grants from the Ministry of Youth and Sports to the Indonesian National Sports Committee (KONI).
The alleged bribery case allegedly involved former Minister of Youth and Sports (Menpora) Nahrawi. KPK investigators are scheduled to call Denim Martyan known today as an employee of a state-owned bank.
"The person concerned (Martyan Denim was summoned in his capacity as a witness for the IMR (Iman Nahrawi) suspect," said KPK Kabri PR spokesman Febri Diansyah in Sumat Jakarta (04/11/2019).
KPK investigators had previously named Imam Nahrawi as a suspect in a suspected bribery case related to the KONI grant. The priest at the time was suspected of receiving a bribe of Rp. 26.5 billion.
KPK Deputy Chairman Alexander Marwata previously said that in the period of 2014 to 2018, IMR (Menpora) through MIU as Menpora's personal assistant was alleged to have received Rp 14.7 billion.
The KPK suspects that the suspect Imam was also suspected of asking for Rp 11.8 billion in the period 2016 to 2018. The total alleged receipt was 26.5 billion.
The money is allegedly a "commitment fee" related to the management of grants submitted by KONI to the Ministry of Youth and Sports in 2018. Acceptance is also suspected to be related to the position of Imam as Chairman of the Satlak Prima Steering Board.
